name: TrelloBoard Clone
desc: A Trello Clone dashboard for managing and tracking tasks for respective users involving API calls to add, delete users, create, edit, view and maintain a history of tasks using Java Spring MVC, Hibernate and MySQL.

name: Financial News Sentiment Analysis
desc: Comparative sentiment analysis on financial news and blockchain data, implementing NLP techniques and highlighting accuracy variations between traditional ML and deep learning models

name: Facial Emotion Detection
desc: A hands-on approach using Python demonstrating CNNs' role in computer vision for emotion recognition..

name: AI Gomoku Game Implementation
desc: Involves development, testing and analysis of an AI utilizing a minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning for strategic decision-making in the Gomoku game
